name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Overview of structural requirements and design principles for spacecraft.

lessons.name: Materials for Space
lessons.description: Study of materials used in spacecraft for strength, weight, and temperature resistance.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Methods
lessons.description: Techniques for analyzing stress, vibration, and fatigue in spacecraft frames.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler’s Laws and Orbits
lessons.description: Application of Kepler’s laws to spacecraft trajectories.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers and Maneuvers
lessons.description: Concepts such as Hohmann transfer, plane changes, and station keeping.

lessons.name: Delta-V and Propellant Budgeting
lessons.description: Calculating velocity changes and fuel requirements for missions.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems and Thermal Control
lessons.description: Design of power generation and thermal regulation subsystems.

lessons.name: Command, Control, and Communication
lessons.description: Avionics, telemetry, and ground communication systems in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Payload and Integration
lessons.description: Subsystem interaction and payload accommodation in spacecraft design.

name: Hydrocarbons and Functional Groups
description: Introduction to the structure and reactivity of alkanes, alkenes, alkynes, and key functional groups.

lessons.name: Introduction to Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Understand structure and classification of hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Overview of alcohols, ketones, aldehydes, and more.

lessons.name: Reactivity Patterns
lessons.description: Learn how functional groups influence molecular reactivity.

name: Stereochemistry
description: Explore molecular geometry, chirality, and isomerism in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Chirality and Enantiomers
lessons.description: Handedness of molecules and its implications.

lessons.name: R/S and D/L Notation
lessons.description: Learn to assign and interpret stereochemical labels.

name: Spectroscopy and Mechanisms
description: Analyze organic molecules using NMR and IR spectroscopy and understand common reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Step-by-step breakdown of substitution and elimination reactions.

lessons.name: Synthesis Planning
lessons.description: Combine reactions for complex organic synthesis.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Explore coordination compounds, their structures, and bonding.

lessons.name: Introduction to Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Basics of ligands and coordination numbers.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Understanding ligand field splitting and color.

lessons.name: Nomenclature and Isomerism
lessons.description: Naming and identifying isomers in coordination compounds.

name: Transition Metals and Bonding
description: Study of bonding in transition metal complexes.

lessons.name: Transition Metal Series
lessons.description: Trends and properties across the d-block.

lessons.name: MO Theory in Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Use of molecular orbitals to explain bonding.

name: Applications of Inorganic Chemistry
description: Real-world applications such as catalysis and bioinorganic systems.

lessons.name: Industrial Catalysts
lessons.description: Use of inorganic catalysts in industry.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Role of metal ions in biology.

name: Thermodynamics in Chemistry
description: Thermodynamic principles applied to chemical systems.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: First and second laws in chemical contexts.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of reaction rates and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Rate Laws
lessons.description: Order of reaction and rate constants.

name: Quantum Chemistry and Spectroscopy
description: Quantum principles and spectroscopy techniques.

name: Elvish Languages
description: Study of Sindarin and Quenya structure and use.

name: Dwarvish and Black Speech
description: Study of Khuzdul and Black Speech of Mordor.

name: Philology of Middle-earth
description: Tolkien's linguistic philosophy and world-building.

name: Alliances and Conflicts
description: History of diplomacy and war in Middle-earth.

name: Leadership and Power
description: Exploring roles of leadership across races.

lessons.name: Aragorn’s Rise
lessons.description: Leadership in Men and unity of kingdoms.

name: Diplomatic Case Studies
description: Deep analysis of events and resolutions.
